title: Chapter 841
body:
Chapter 841

841 Chapter 841-borrowing the cauldron’s might

In Lu Ming’s sea of consciousness, the lightning cauldron shook and a leisurely voice was transmitted into the divine Nine-Dragon Cauldron.

...

Thump!

At this moment, the Divine Nine-Dragon Cauldron shook even more violently.

The mountain that he was standing on exploded, and countless rocks shot into the distance.

“Rise!”

lu ming hugged the cauldron’s leg and shouted.

Then, to everyone’s shock, the cauldron that was as large as a mountain actually left the ground.

Yes, Lu Ming carried her and lifted her off the ground.

At this moment, the entire place was dead silent.

“Divine cauldron, fight with me!”

Lu Ming roared again. Suddenly, he spat out a mouthful of blood on the Divine Nine-Dragon Cauldron. The blood came from the bloodline of the nine Dragons. It flowed down Lu Ming’s throat and onto the Divine Nine-Dragon Cauldron.

Thump!

The Divine Nine-Dragon Cauldron trembled even more intensely. It emitted a brilliant light as Lu Ming lifted it up high.

“Heavens, heavens, what did I just see? Lu Ming has lifted the Divine Nine-Dragon Cauldron. He has really lifted the Divine Nine-Dragon Cauldron!”

unbelievable! Unbelievable! Could it be that the Divine Nine-Dragon Cauldron has acknowledged him? unbelievable!

Almost everyone was shouting like crazy.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

The Dragon’s Vein shook violently, as if it was about to turn into a Dragon and leave.

At this moment, it was not only this Dragon’s Vein. The other eight Dragon’s veins in Nine Dragons city were also shaking violently. At the head of each Dragon’s Vein was a huge cauldron. Now, those huge cauldrons were all shaking.

“What’s going on? What’s happening?”

Above the Dragon vein, countless experts who were in seclusion opened their eyes one after another, revealing a look of horror.

the Dragon veins are shaking, and the Divine Nine-Dragon Cauldron is shaking. What’s going on? ”

Countless voices were heard. At this moment, countless top powers in ninedragons were alarmed.

In the depths of the six ancient families, six middle-aged men opened their eyes. These six middle-aged men were the family Masters of the six ancient families who had been summoned by Martial Emperor Di Yi last time.

the Divine Nine-Dragon Cauldron is shaking. What happened? ”

Bewildered voices came from the six people.

In the depths of Di Tian’s Imperial Guards, Yan kuangtu was gulping down wine. Suddenly, his eyes shone with a brilliant light as he stood up and looked into the distance.

the Divine Nine-Dragon Cauldron, which has never moved since ancient times, is actually moving. Interesting!

Yan kuangtu’s voice was filled with curiosity.

On the dragon’s head, Lu Ming pulled out the cauldron and stood up. Everyone’s eyes fell out in shock.

the Divine Nine-Dragon Cauldron actually became lighter after the blood of the nine Dragons fell on it!

Lu Ming’s mind was racing. He took a deep breath and stepped into the air.

Bang!

The space trembled. Lu Ming carried the cauldron and stepped into the void, causing the space to shake violently. However, Lu Ming stood firmly in the void.

“Let’s go!”

Then, Lu Ming took another step forward. Although the void trembled, Lu Ming stood firmly.

“Little Qing, I’m here!”

Lu Ming quickened his pace. He stepped on the void and headed towards the ocean waves ancient garden.

At this moment, the sky was filled with people, but they were all dumbfounded as they looked at this scene.

Lu Ming could actually carry the cauldron and walk in the air, walking into the distance.

What was he doing?

Countless people followed behind Lu Ming, wanting to see what was going on.

“Lu Ming, the Divine Nine-Dragon Cauldron is the most precious treasure in ninedragons. What do you mean by carrying the cauldron? Why aren’t you putting it down!”

A few elders appeared in front of Lu Ming and berated him.

A terrifying aura emanated from his body.

It was the aura of a spirit embryo realm cultivator.

“It’s an expert from the Imperial Guards of Ditian!”

Some people recognized that Di Tian’s Imperial Guards were the closest to this place, and an expert had rushed over.

“Get lost!”

Lu Ming berated and took a step forward.

BOOM!

This step seemed to borrow the power of the cauldron, and endless pressure pressed down on the powerhouses.

“How is that possible?”

Countless people gasped.

Lu Ming took a step forward and actually made a few spirit embryo realm experts cough up blood as they were sent flying. This was too unbelievable.

“Lu Ming seems to be able to borrow the power of the Divine Nine-Dragon Cauldron. Terrifying, terrifying. How did he do it?”

the Divine Nine-Dragon Cauldron can’t be touched by emperors. Not only can he lift it, but he can also borrow the power of the cauldron. How can this be? ”

The surroundings were in a clamor.

The experts who wanted to stop Lu Ming had a terrible look on their faces. They did not dare to make a move.

Lu Ming stepped on the void and walked faster and faster. In the end, he directly ran, covering dozens of miles in an instant.

In the blink of an eye, three hours had passed.

Lu Ming was surrounded by people. Everyone looked at Lu Ming and the person who was carrying the cauldron in a daze.

Compared to the Divine Nine-Dragon Cauldron, Lu Ming’s size was really small. However, he could carry the Divine Nine-Dragon Cauldron.

This scene was deeply imprinted in everyone’s hearts.

“We’ve arrived at the ocean waves ancient garden!”

Lu Ming’s gaze was fixed ahead.

After three hours, Lu Ming finally arrived at the hai LAN ancient gardens.

In front of them, the palace was located on a mountain peak. The clouds were misty, making it look like a paradise.

This was the ocean waves ancient garden, the place where the Emperor heaven divine Palace was used to receive important guests.

The commotion outside had obviously alerted the Hailan ancient garden.

Buzzzzzz! Buzzzzzz!

A figure flew out.

It was Xie Zhen, as well as the man and woman. The protector was also there, and there were also two middle-aged men.

At this moment, Xie Zhen and the others were looking at Lu Ming in shock. Lu Ming was actually carrying a huge cauldron over.

“Lu Ming, it’s you again, you b * stard. What are you doing here? Are you here to die?”

Xie Zhen coldly shouted, his eyes flickering with an ice-cold light.

“Hand over little Qing. Since little Qing is unwilling to go back with you, I won’t let her go with you!”

Lu Ming’s voice could be heard from afar.

little bastard, you still haven’t given up? fine, since you’ve come to die, I’ll send you on your way. Take him down!

Xie Zhen waved his hand.

The two middle-aged men stepped out, and a powerful aura burst out from their bodies.

The spirit embryo realm. These two burly men were spirit embryo realm experts.

“Get lost!”

Lu Ming shouted and took a step forward.

An endless pressure exploded. The two men’s expressions changed drastically. They screamed and were sent flying, coughing up blood.

“How did this happen?”

Xie Zhen’s eyes almost popped out of their sockets. His mouth was wide open in disbelief.

Thump!

Lu Ming took another step forward and a violent pressure pressed down on Xie Zhen.

“Eighth prince, be careful!”

The Guardian moved and appeared in front of Xie Zhen. A terrifying aura burst out from his body. With a punch, the world shook and the space trembled violently. A pillar of air shot up into the sky and blocked Lu Ming’s stomp with the power of the cauldron.

Spiritual God Realm powerhouses were terrifyingly powerful. Lu Ming could not do anything to them even with the power of the cauldron.

the legendary Divine Nine-Dragon Cauldron of ninedragons was pulled out by you. Unbelievable! I can’t let you live today!

A killing intent flashed through the eyes of The Guardian Knight as he stepped forward.

BOOM!

As The Guardian stepped forward, his aura soared into the sky and reached an unbelievable level. Endless pressure spread out and covered a radius of 10000 miles. It was like the might of heaven.
